Episode Summary: Episode # 7009 ~ Liam & Bill plan vengeance on those who hurt their loved ones; Wyatt moves to defend himself against Rick.
Recap: Steffy rages at Ridge that his relationship with Caroline is wrong on so many levels. Maybe she should butt out but she can not do that but it needs to end. No father should act that way, especially her father. Caroline wants to avoid Rick but he calls a meeting with just her and asks if she is afraid of him, to see if he is packing some heat. Wyatt walks in before he can say more. Rick berates him for two reasons ..for stopping off to see his mom first and not coming straight to the office and that is assuming he even has a job to come back to. Wyatt is taken aback at his attitude. Bill tells Liam that taking over FC will take patience and planning and must be on the QT. Katie walks in and hears just enough to assume they are talking about acquiring FC. Liam fills her in on what's happening at FC with Rick shooting up his office. Something has to be done as both Caroline and Ivy are in danger. Wyatt says it isn't what he wanted but what Hope needed but now he is back and ready to throw everything into his job. Rick tells him whoa cowboy, he is far from coming back to his job that he abandoned. And now that he is not so married to his sister that is in jeopardy and worth re-thinking. Wyatt reminds him that he okayed that time off for him to see his wife. Rick says he did but he did not think Wyatt would take advantage of his generosity. Wyatt says he loves his job but nobody owns him, not even FC and the sooner that Rick understands that the better they will all be.

Caroline is distracted while Aly is trying to talk to her abut her shoe line. Ridge tells Steffy that yes Bill dropped him on his head as she so sweetly mentioned, and he lost something. But Caroline was there to help him so it's not fair of Steffy to twist it otherwise. She accuses him of being a cradle robber but realizes he has true feelings for Caroline .which she thinks is disgusting because of the age difference but also because Caroline is his first wife's niece. Rick asks Wyatt if he is finished now and feels better. Wyatt says yes. Rick says good because Hope for the Future has been put on hold because of him. And Wyatt will never talk to him like that again. Wyatt demands that he not hold him responsible for all that has happened. None of this is worth it ..he quits. He goes directly to SP and Liam and Bill welcome him home. Liam asks if Hope is with him. Wyatt says no, she stayed in Italy. His marriage and baby boy is gone and now his job too. Liam drags it out of him that he went to FC to throw himself into his job but ended up quitting before Rick could fire him. Liam tells him no; he can not do that. They need him at FC. Ridge says he knows how this looks, it's a delusional mess. Steffy says maybe she has been in Paris too long. Maybe she should be running FC. She has to do something while there is still time. Rick tells Aly and Caroline that Wyatt has given him attitude and he has used his last chance with him. Bill and Liam fill Wyatt in on the gun situation and they understand how Wyatt feels but they need Wyatt there on the inside to help them with their plan. Liam has come up with a plan of a hostile takeover, the only way all of this will work. They need Wyatt as a double agent working on the inside. So Wyatt will have to swallow his pride, beg if he has to as they need inside information to hit Rick where he hurts most.
Transcript: Steffy: You and Caroline -- it is wrong for so many reasons.
Ridge: Steffy, you got to slow down for a second --
Steffy: It is, Dad! You may not see it, but everybody else does.
Ridge: Who's everybody else? Talk to Brooke and Rick? Who do you talk to?
Steffy: Oh, Brooke can't like it any better than I do. Doesn't that tell you something?
Ridge: Yeah. I realize you're trying to help, but maybe the best thing to do is --

Steffy: Oh, maybe I should butt out? I'm sorry! I can't do that! Like I said before, you and Caroline -- it needs to end. Like, come on! Am I taking crazy pills here? She's way too young! Not to mention your first wife's niece! No father should ever act that way, especially my father! You're a man that I love and admire.
Ridge: Until now, you mean.
Steffy: [Sighs]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Caroline: Shouldn't Ivy be here for this?
Rick: If I wanted Ivy here, I would have asked her.
Caroline: Fine. But when you requested updates of our latest designs...
Rick: What? You afraid to be alone with me now? You worried I might be packing heat? Hey. [Chuckles] You care to frisk me? Or wouldn't Ridge approve?
Wyatt: Hey, Caroline, have you seen -- oh. There you are.
Rick: I'm sorry. Do I know you?
Wyatt: [Sighs] Come on. I haven't been gone for that long, have I?
Caroline: Welcome back, Cousin. When did you get back in?
Wyatt: I made a stop at mom's and then I came here right after.
Rick: That was your first mistake. You should have come straight from the airport to Forrester. Your second mistake -- assuming that you actually have a job to still come back to.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Liam: Yeah, just route it my way. I'll make a decision today and get back to you. Okay. Thanks. Bye. One of the perks of being president of Spencer -- absolute power.
Bill: Oh, careful. Starting to sound like Rick.
Liam: Oh!
[Cellphone chimes]
Bill: Steffy?
Liam: No, she hasn't gotten back to me yet.
Bill: Wait till she sees the carnage that is taking place at her grandparents' company.
Liam: Yeah, well, she'll be a lot more likely to merge her stock with ours and bring Thomas and his shares with her.

Bill: Liam, that's still not gonna give us majority of the shares. Now, look, a corporate takeover of this magnitude requires meticulous planning and patience. Steffy knows this is on the Q.T., right? I mean, one slip even to her old man --
Liam: Oh, no, no, no. I -- [Chuckles] I wouldn't worry about that. Steffy's not exactly thrilled with Ridge right now.
Bill: What daughter would be? The dressmaker's a pig, lusting after my niece. And the only thing worse is Rick berating her on a daily basis.
Liam: Yeah, well, all the more reason to take control of the company, restore some sanity by ousting the guy, despite his so-called "irrevocable control."
Katie: What's going on? Sounds like you were talking about Forrester. What are you two up to? Irrevocable control? That sounds like Rick's position at Forrester.
Liam: Spencer's new V.P. doesn't miss much.
Katie: And Spencer's new president isn't answering my question.
Liam: How much do you know?
Katie: I know what's going on. I know that Rick is being a colossal jerk to everyone except for Maya.
Bill: Unfortunately, my niece has taken most of the heat.
Katie: Well, he is the undisputed C.E.O. for at least another year, so there's not much they can do about it.
Bill: Short of murder.
Liam: Well, it's a volatile situation. I mean, who knows what's gonna happen next?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Wyatt: It's not what I wanted, but it's what Hope felt like she needed. Uh, so... but I'm -- I'm back, and I am -- I'm ready to just throw myself back into work if --
Rick: Whoa! Whoa! Ho! Not so fast there, cowboy. Caroline, could you excuse us? I have something I have to deal with.
[Door opens]
[Door closes]
Wyatt: Why do I feel like I'm being thrown in front of a firing squad here?
Rick: You've been gone. You shrugged off your responsibilities here at the company. You know, if you hadn't been married to my sister... [Chuckles] Now that you're not...
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ridge: I know it doesn't always seem that way, but you kids are the most important thing in my life. And if I ever knowingly upset or embarrassed you or Thomas or R.J., I-I --

Steffy: Then talk to Caroline. Tell her whatever fantasy she has about you two are just fantasies. She says that she has feelings for you and claims that you feel the same. She's confused. I know you don't have feelings for her. Oh, my God. You do.
[SCENE_BREAK]

Aly: So, by this time next year, maybe my shoe line will be a big hit like Ivy's jewelry line. Of course, it all hinges on a certain someone's approval. Look, if Rick isn't on board, then maybe... hey, are you okay? Has something happened?
Caroline: [Sighs] Steffy's back in town.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Steffy: You and Caroline? I can't believe this!
Ridge: We're not rushing things. We're just --
Steffy: What do you mean, you're not rushing things?! You realize it's inappropriate or you don't want to rush things because you're investing in the relationship and you want to do it right?
Ridge: Steffy, I --
Steffy: No, Dad! Which is it?!

Ridge: No, let -- let me finish. Yes, Bill dropped me on my head like you so sweetly said earlier, and I lost something. I lost my ability to draw, and I didn't know until right that moment that that is the one thing that defines me as a person.
Steffy: [Sighs]
Ridge: And Caroline was there. She was there for me. She didn't want anything. She was just there for me, to help me.
Steffy: Oh, yeah.
Ridge: And we -- don't do that. We -- we connect--
Steffy: So it just happened. It just happened.
Ridge: [Sighs]
Steffy: Huh? Yeah? Yeah. Yeah, you were helpless, so you couldn't stop it.
Ridge: Just trying to live my life, Steffy.
Steffy: By robbing the cradle?! Dad, you are tearing a family apart, not to mention a company that you supposedly love!
Ridge: That's not fair.
Steffy: [Chuckling] Oh. No, it's not fair. You're just gonna do what you want whether your daughter likes it or not.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Liam: How many people know about this?
Katie: Um, I've just told Brooke.
Liam: Oh. How did that go?

Katie: Fine. Though I did pick up on a strange vibe. Not about the engagement. I think she's as happy as she can be about that. But when I walked in, she was with Caroline, and things were a wee bit tense.
Bill: Give you three guesses why.
Liam: Ridge and Caroline, right?
Katie: Well, according to Brooke, there will be no Ridge and Caroline. Not sure what she meant by that.
Bill: Maybe she's hiring a hit man to take Forrester out.
Liam: Maybe she should focus on reining in her renegade son. Did you hear he pulled a gun?
Katie: What?!
Liam: Yeah, he shot up his old office, scared Caroline half to death.
Bill: My niece shouldn't have to put up with that crap.
Liam: Neither should Ivy. I mean, he -- he's mistreating her, too. Something's got to be done.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Wyatt: In case you've forgotten, I cleared my time off with you before I left to go visit my wife, your sister.

Rick: True. I just didn't expect you to take full advantage of my generosity. The bottom line is, Hope for the Future has been in a holding pattern. My sister's absence is excusable. Yours, however, is not.
Wyatt: Why? 'Cause I'm not a Forrester and she is? Oh, wait. She's not, though. Not really. But her C.E.O. brother is, and that's why she gets a pass? Is that it?
Rick: I'd watch it if I were you.

Wyatt: You watch it! I have been through my own Hell, all right?! And if you think I'm gonna stand here and let you pile it on, you got another thing coming. This is a job and one that I happen to love very, very much. But you don't own me. Forrester Creations doesn't own me. And the sooner you get that straight, the better off we'll both be.
Rick: You feel better now?
Wyatt: Actually, yeah.

Rick: Good. Because that's the last time you'll ever speak to me that way. No, I may not own you. But when you work for me, I own your time and I own your talent, which I've seen none of as of lately, and that, my friend, is a problem.
Wyatt: And I have explained to you why I haven't --
Rick: You should have dealt with your things more expeditiously in Italy. Instead, you drew them out and you left Forrester Creations in the lurch.
Wyatt: Hey, I didn't draw anything out!

Rick: You know that you don't have my sister to hide behind any longer, things are gonna be a little bit different around here, starting with all the overtime you're gonna be putting in to make up for all the time that you had off!

Wyatt: Like Hell I am! I'm not gonna let you punish me after everything I've done for this company! I'm the one who brought Forrester the Hope for the Future diamond! I spearheaded the photo shoots in Paris and Amsterdam! Either you're gonna respect my contributions, respect me, or... no. You know what? You. The Forresters. You're not even worth it. I quit.
[Door closes]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ridge: Hey. Can we not fight, please? You just got here. And I know I've made some -- some tough choices, especially when you were younger. But I-I-I was just hoping that maybe now --
Steffy: What? You -- you think I'd be worldly enough now to accept what you're doing?
Ridge: Yeah.
Steffy: When I just explained to you all the reasons why I can't? [Sighs]
Ridge: I'm missing something here, right? There's -- there's something else. Did I do something, say something else to upset you? Because you reacting this way doesn't...

Steffy: Dad, you can't possibly think I'd be okay with this. Much less anything else that's happened because of it. Rick moved himself and his mistress into my grandparents' home. Maya's picture is hanging where my namesake should be. You know, when Rick's not firing guns, he's terrorizing people at the company. And Forrester is suffering, and it all started with you and Caroline. Dad, that's what hurts the most.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Aly: Maybe Steffy just needs time. It had to be a huge shock, finding out about her dad and you. Ugh. Incoming.
Rick: Have either of you seen Wyatt?
Caroline: He was just with you.
Rick: We had words. He quit.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Bill: Let me know the minute you hear anything from Steffy.
Liam: I thought I was quarterbacking this.
Bill: You are. But I'm the head coach.
Liam: [Chuckles]
Wyatt: Hey. Alison said you'd both be in here.
Bill: Well, I'll be damned!
Wyatt: That glad to see me, huh?
Bill: When'd you get in?
Wyatt: Earlier. Had to make a couple of stops first.
Liam: Welcome home, Bro.
Wyatt: Thanks.
Liam: Is, uh... Hope with you?
Wyatt: Uh...no. She's staying in Italy.
Bill: And you're back in L.A. for good?
Wyatt: Yeah, it's, uh, it's over between Hope and me. Our marriage is done, so, you know, thought you guys should know. [Clears throat]
Bill: You okay?
Wyatt: [Scoffs] Lost my wife and my little boy, and now I lost my job, so it hasn't been the best time being back.
Liam: Wait -- wait a second. You lost your job?
Wyatt: Yeah. I went over there to tell Rick that I was back and ready to go, and then he gave me some attitude, so I quit.
Liam: No. No.
Wyatt: I sure as Hell wasn't gonna let him fire me!
Liam: No, no, no, no. Wyatt, Wyatt, you can't quit your job! We need you at Forrester Creations!
[SCENE_BREAK]
Ridge: I know how this looks. This whole thing is just a dysfunctional mess.
Steffy: It's only getting worse. The company is imploding. Or will be shortly if...
Ridge: If what?
Steffy: Maybe I've been in Paris for too long. Maybe I should be running Forrester Creations.
Ridge: Honey, I don't -- what does that mean? What are you --

Steffy: I own part of this company, too. I have an investment to protect. So if you won't give up Caroline and Rick won't change his ways, well, what choice do I have? I've got to do something... while there's still time.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Aly: Whatever was said, can't you cut Wyatt a little slack?
Caroline: I mean, he just got back from Italy. His marriage is over.
Aly: What?
Rick: Yeah, he and my sister are over, as if that's any surprise. Except maybe to Wyatt. Still, that's no excuse for him giving me attitude.
Aly: I'm sorry, but that doesn't sound like Wyatt at all. You know, we all know he can be a little headstrong.

Rick: So I'm the bad guy here, not him? So much for kissing up to your boss to get that shoe line approved. In any case, if that's the way Wyatt's going to be after all the opportunities that Forrester has given him, so be it. The guy's burned his last bridge with me.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Wyatt: You want me back at Forrester?
Liam: Yes, especially if everything comes together the way I'm hoping it does.
Wyatt: H-h-h-hold on a second. I heard you're president and Katie's V.P. now. Now, is pressing me to stay at Forrester a way of keeping me away from Spencer?

Bill: No! No! Absolutely not! Wyatt, this is a family business, even more so now that Katie's agreed to remarry me. That's another story. Eventually, I want all my boys here. But for the time being, we need you at Forrester.
Wyatt: Why?
Liam: You know Rick is on a huge power trip, right?
Wyatt: Uh, yeah.
Liam: Okay, well, since you left, it's gotten a whole lot worse. I mean, now he's picking on Ivy. He continues to terrorize Caroline.
Bill: He pulled a gun on her, Wyatt.
Wyatt: What?
Liam: Not only that, he shot into the room where she and Ridge were. I mean, it just shows you how out of control he is.
Wyatt: All the more reason why I don't want to answer to him!
Bill: And your brother and I understand why you feel that way, Wyatt, but for the time --
Wyatt: You still want me to get my job back at Forrester anyway.
Both: Yes.
Liam: 'Cause having a Spencer on the inside works to our advantage.
Wyatt: You still haven't told me what you're planning.
Bill: Now, before we do that, you should know that Rick isn't the only problem. Ridge crossed a line with Caroline, seduced her into thinking she can't live without him.
Wyatt: What?
Bill: The good news is, your brother here came up with a plan.
Liam: Hostile takeover of Forrester Creations. It's the only way to end the madness.
Bill: And it's a sound business move for Spencer.
Liam: Now, it's not gonna be easy, because both Eric and Ridge have majority shares.
Bill: And that's a major hurdle.
Liam: But if certain other pieces fall into place, then I can pull off something else that I'm working on, which you could be instrumental in if you're passing us information on the inside.
Wyatt: As a double agent.
Liam: It's a little 007, I know. But if you're there and you're working and you're undercover... the only thing is, you need your job back.
Bill: So you're gonna do whatever you have to do. Swallow your pride, ask for your job back, beg if you have to.
Liam: We have to position ourselves to strike at the most opportune moment, and inside information could be critical. But, Wyatt, we can't let Rick get away with this.
Bill: Ridge, either.
Liam: Dad, if we hit him where it hurts most by taking his company away from him, there is no way he can continue to abuse the women we love after we're through with him.
